## Table of ROM checksums

Here are the CRC-16/XModem values for all of the Model T ROMs which
have been reported so far. If you find one not listed, please open an
[issue](issues) so it can be added to the list. Ideally, include a
copy of your ROM, but at a minimum, please include the calculated CRC
and a name to call your variation.

[issues]: https://github.com/hackerb9/crc16-modelt/issues "Report a bug"


### Original system ROMs
The system ROMs as they came from the factory back in the 1980s.
|Machine Name              |Version  |CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------              |-------  |-----:|-------:|
|Kyocera Kyotronic 85      |orig     | F08D | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8201               |A.orig   | A48D | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8300               |orig     | 9FF5 | 128K   |
|Olivetti M10 Eur          |orig     | 5DD2 | 32K    |
|Olivetti M10 North America|orig     | 5D9F | 32K    |
|Tandy 102 uk              |orig     | 5CF0 | 32K    |
|Tandy 102 us              |orig     | 1C6F | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M13.orig | 3D1A | 8.0K   |
|Tandy 200                 |M14.orig | 958C | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M15.orig | 9535 | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |us.orig  | C061 | 72K    |
|Televerket Modell 100     |orig     | 2A64 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100          |orig     | 34F5 | 32K    |

### ROM Variants
Modified ROMs, for example with Y2K patches, will have different
checksums than the original. The Virtual T emulator can also
dynamically patch the ROMs to show the version on the Menu. See also
the [directory of sample ROMs](ROMs), (mirrored from
[tandy.wiki][tandy.wiki]).

[tandy.wiki]: http://tandy.wiki/Model_T_System_ROMs "List of system ROMs, the builtin software on a chip"
|Machine Name              |Version         |CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------              |-------         |-----:|-------:|
|Kyocera Kyotronic 85      |y2k             | 64A8 | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8201               |A.REX.y2k       | 87F7 | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8201               |A.y2k           | 8CA0 | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8201               |Japan           | 0508 | 32K    |
|NEC PC-8300               |y2k             | E3A9 | 128K   |
|Olivetti M10 Eur          |y2k             | 1B13 | 32K    |
|Olivetti M10 North America|y2k             | 5E44 | 32K    |
|Tandy 102                 |REX.y2k         | 870F | 32K    |
|Tandy 102 uk              |y2k             | 9EC4 | 32K    |
|Tandy 102 us              |y2k             | DE5B | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M13.REX         | B76F | 20K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M15.corrupt     | 7C97 | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M15.REX.corrupt | 25C3 | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M15.REX.y2k     | 3EFF | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |M15.y2k         | 67AB | 32K    |
|Tandy 200                 |us.y2k          | 9534 | 72K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100          |LibROM-1.1a     | 60F0 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100          |REX.y2k         | AF95 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100 uk       |skl             | 7A77 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100 uk       |y2k             | A010 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100 us       |26-3802B        | 6224 | 32K    |
|TRS-80 Model 100          |y2k             | F6C1 | 32K    |

### Other related ROMs
These ROMs are not system ROMs for Kyotronic-like computers, but they
are related.
|Machine Name            |Version|CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------            |-------|-----:|-------:|
|HD61830                 |lcd    | 70C3 | 4.0K   |
|NEC PC-8300 Beckman-E3.2|orig   | 4793 | 32K    |
|Tandy 600               |BASIC  | A2B3 | 32K    |
